Package tage.audio

Class AudioPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • tage.audio.AudioPlayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAudioPlayer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    JOALAudioPlayer
    public abstract class AudioPlayer
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAudioPlayer
    This class acts as the abstract base class from which all concrete Audio Players are derived. It provides functions common to all audio players, deferring the implementation of most IAudioPlayer methods to concrete subclasses. This class is responsible for playing an individual piece of audio.
    Author:
    Kenneth Barnett, Mike McShaffry Modified from the SAGE Audio package for the RAGE game engine by Juan E. Ruiz.
    See Also:
    Game Coding Complete

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean getIsLooping()
      Returns true if this AudioPlayer is looping the sound; false otherwise.
      boolean getIsPaused()
      Returns true if this AudioPlayer is paused; false otherwise.
      AudioResource getResource()
      Returns the AudioResource used by this AudioPlayer.
      SoundType getSoundType()
      Returns the type of sound that this AudioPlayer is responsible for playing.
      int getVolume()
      Returns the volume that this AudioPlayer is playing the sound at.
